## OpenAI

### Company overview   

OpenAI is a pioneering artificial intelligence research laboratory consisting of the for-profit corporation OpenAI LP and its parent company, the non-profit OpenAI Inc. Founded in December 2015 in San Francisco, California, OpenAI has quickly grown to become one of the most influential players in the AI industry, with a team of over 375 employees as of 2021.  


# 1. Company Overview   
-Founded date, location, size    
-Mission and vision    
-Key executives   

OpenAI was founded in December 2015 in San Francisco, California, and has grown to employ over 500 people. The company's mission is to ensure that artificial general intelligence (AGI) benefits all of humanity. OpenAI's vision is to be at the forefront of AGI development while prioritizing safety and ethical considerations. Key executives include Sam Altman (CEO), Greg Brockman (President), and Ilya Sutskever (Chief Scientist).   

# 2. Products and Services  
-Main AI offerings  
-Target markets and industries  
OpenAI's main AI offerings include GPT (Generative Pre-trained Transformer) language models, DALL-E image generation models, and Codex for code generation. These products target a wide range of industries, including technology, healthcare, education, and creative fields. OpenAI's services are used by developers, researchers, and businesses worldwide for various applications such as natural language processing, content creation, and software development.
